io.micronaut.inject

Interface FieldInjectionPoint<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The field component type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotatedElement, AnnotationMetadataProvider, InjectionPoint

    public interface FieldInjectionPoint<T>
extends InjectionPoint, AnnotatedElement, AnnotationMetadataProvider
    Defines an injection point for a field.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
